WRITING.TITLE: [ CA ] who owns the fence on a property line?
WRITING.TEXT: There is no trouble. There is a fence that is bordering the property line of our small residential lot, my family built it with permission from all parties after the last fence had too much wear in tear, in particular our neighbors had a vicious dog that would throw itself as the fence until it broke through one day. Hmm assuming that each family is around 5 members that survived to reproduce 5 more, it would be nearly 2 million so I assume there were exceptions or people flat out denied being related.
Edit: wow my assumption of 5 per family was nearly spot on (4.95 avg) but women after marriage were no longer considered part of their family so if we use only the figure of 2.5 per family, you would only have to kill ~3,800 people to punish up to the 9th degree. Definitely doable. Also the figure is not taking into account relatives marrying and potentially many more factors.

Pretty much US installed missiles in turkey, turkey is not that far from Russia, so the USSR in retaliation installed or mostly installed missiles in Cuba. Cuba missile crisis happens and backroom negotiations happen: US removes turkey missiles and USSR removes Cuba missiles.
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuban_Missile_Crisis
Edit: more information. It really feels like a play the whole crisis, with the US and the USSR making bold statements but secretly contacting each other. Such as USSR making a televised statement painting the blockade as an act closer to war but secretly sending telegrams to the US saying we won't actually do much.
